html:
Thou hast not brought me…burnt offerings. The children of Israel had ceased to honor the Lord with their sacrifices. They did not bring the best of their flocks to him (43:24; Mal. 1:6-7), and some neglected to offer a sacrifice at all, denying themselves purification from sin.

I have not…wearied thee with incense. The offerings and incense were meant not to weary the Lord's people but to strengthen them.
